casebody.data:
Third Department,

September, 1959

(September 23, 1959) The People of the State of New York, Plaintiff, v. Harry Bareika, Harry Bareika, Inc., Walter Motor Truck Company and Rand-MacMurray, Inc., Defendants.

Motion for bill of particulars granted in the respects specified by the moving party. Defendants’ time to move in respect of the indictment is extended to 10 days from the service of the bill of particulars. Foster, P. J., Bergan, Gibson, Herlihy and Reynolds, JJ., concur.
